projDesc: Full stack vanilla JS application written in the MVC architecture. A server side is managed with Node to read, write, and update to an SQL database. Users can log in and view lessons to learn about working on cars, and are then prompted to complete quizzes after each lesson. Passing a quiz unlocks the next lesson. All content and artwork used in the lesson material is original and this project showcases what is possible with a coding knowledge on top of being able to create original art assets in the Adobe creative products.

techs.desc: a domain-specific language used in programming and designed for managing data held in a relational database management system, or for stream processing in a relational data stream management system.
the standard markup language for documents designed to be displayed in a web browser.
an application programming interface (API or web API) that conforms to the constraints of REST architectural style and allows for interaction with RESTful web services.
an open-source, cross-platform, back-end JavaScript runtime environment that runs on the V8 engine and executes JavaScript code outside a web browser
a programming language that is one of the core technologies of the World Wide Web, alongside HTML and CSS.
a style sheet language used for describing the presentation of a document written in a markup language such as HTML.
a software application for creating drawings, illustrations, and artwork using vector graphics technology.

Photoshop is a photo editing and raster graphic design software which allows users to create, edit, and manipulate various graphics as well as digital art. It also allows to create and edit raster images with multiple layers in various file formats.
